overview: Documented by a young woman hired to take behind-the-scenes footage, a horror movie production comes to a sudden halt when the funding mysteriously disappears. Suspecting the shady Executive Producer is behind it, things get out of hand when a couple of the crew members take drastic action and abduct him.
tagline: The production of a movie was documented on video in 2022. It didn't go exactly as planned.
title: Trail of Doom
